hero.title: AI-powered financial insights
hero.subtitle: We streamline equity analysis and asset management with AI technology and data-driven algorithms. Our insights are delivered faster, more accurately, and with greater reliability than traditional methods.

services.title: Comprehensive analysis suite
services.description: We offer PR analysis, report analysis, pre-report analysis, peer coverage, global and Swedish macro linked to a watchlist, morning briefings and much more. Full flexibility to opt out or into notifications depending on your specific needs.

comparison.title: How we differ
comparison.subtitle: See how we compare to online brokers and LLM tools

about.title: Leading the future of financial insights
about.subtitle: Founded in Stockholm, Sweden, Quanor represents the forefront of AI-driven financial technology.
about.description1: We believe that sophisticated investment insights should not be limited to large institutions. Our platform democratizes advanced market intelligence through new AI technology and algorithms.
about.description2: Every algorithm, every insight is powered by our custom AI models that process large amounts of market data in real time, delivering valuable insights that help you make better investment decisions.
about.team: Our small but dedicated team consists of PhDs in mathematical statistics, AI/LLM experts, data scientists, and entrepreneurs passionate about transforming the financial industry with new technology.

innovation.title: Focus on innovation
innovation.description: Developing the next generation of AI-powered financial insights through our own research and development.

transparency.title: Full transparency
transparency.description: Open about our methods, clear about our limitations, and honest about market uncertainties.

excellence.title: Reliable solutions
excellence.description: Built with precision and focused on delivering consistent, reliable results.

contact.title: Ready to change how you invest?
contact.subtitle: Contact our team to learn how Quanor Insights can improve your investment process.

getInTouch.title: Get in touch
getInTouch.description: Have questions about our AI-powered financial analysis platform? We're here to help you understand how Quanor can streamline your investment process.

form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

invitation.description: Join the next generation of intelligent investors. Request early access to our advanced features and get priority onboarding with our team of experts.

personal.title: Personal information
personal.description: We collect information you provide directly, including name, email address, company information and financial data necessary to provide our AI-powered financial analysis services.

usage.title: Usage data
usage.description: We automatically collect information about your use of our services, including IP address, browser type, device information and usage patterns to improve our AI algorithms.

financial.title: Financial data
financial.description: We process financial market data, portfolio information and investment preferences to provide personalized AI-driven insights and analysis.

howWeUse.title: 2. How we use your information
items: Provide AI-powered financial insights and market analysis for informational purposes only
Generate market insights and sentiment analysis (not investment recommendations)
Improve our machine learning models and algorithms
Send important service updates and market alerts
Comply with financial regulations and legal requirements
Detect and prevent fraud or unauthorized access

legalBasis.title: Legal basis
items: Contract: To provide and administer the service
Legitimate interest: To improve models and prevent abuse
Legal obligation: To comply with financial and regulatory requirements
Consent: When we explicitly request it (e.g., certain communications)

controller.title: Data controller
controller.description: Quanor AB (Reg. No. 559497-1482) is the data controller. Contact: privacy@quanor.com

informationSharing.title: 3. Information sharing and disclosure
informationSharing.description: We do not sell, trade or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except in the following circumstances:
items: Service providers: We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who help operate our platform
Legal compliance: When required by law, regulation or legal process
Business transactions: In connection with a merger, sale or acquisition of assets
Safety and security: To protect the rights, property or safety of Quanor, our customers or others

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data security
dataSecurity.description: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption, secure data transmission, access controls and regular security audits. Our systems comply with financial industry security standards and Swedish data protection regulations.

dataRetention.title: 5. Data retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your personal information as long as necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes and enforce our agreements. Financial data may be retained longer as required by applicable regulations.

yourRights.title: 6. Your rights (GDPR)
yourRights.description: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
items: Access your personal data
Rectify inaccurate information
Erase your data (subject to legal requirements)
Restrict processing of your data
Data portability
Object to processing
Withdraw consent at any time

contact.title: 7. Contact information
contact.description: For questions about this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, contact us at:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of terms
acceptance.description: By using Quanor's AI-powered financial analysis platform, you accept and agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not agree to these terms, you may not use our services.

description.title: 2. Description of service
description.description: Quanor provides AI-powered financial analysis services including:
items: PR analysis and report analysis
Pre-report analysis and market insights
Peer coverage and market flashes
Global and Swedish macro analysis
Morning briefings and customizable notifications
Coverage of 900+ Swedish companies

account.title: Account responsibility
account.description: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and for all activities under your account.

acceptable.title: Acceptable use
acceptable.description: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You must not attempt to reverse engineer, hack or misuse our AI systems.

data.title: Data accuracy
data.description: You are responsible for providing accurate information and maintaining the accuracy of your account data.

disclaimer.title: 4. Investment and information disclaimer
disclaimer.critical: CRITICAL DISCLAIMER: Quanor AB (Reg. No. 559497-1482) provides informational services only. We do NOT provide financial, investment or legal advice.
items: No investment advice: Our insights and analysis do not constitute investment recommendations or offers to buy or sell securities
No warranties: We make no warranties or representations regarding the accuracy, completeness or reliability of the information provided

Sentiment labels: Sentiment labels from Quanor are not buy/sell suggestions. “Positive”/“Negative”/“Neutral” reflect how our AI perceives that a news item or information is likely to affect the company’s stock price in the short term (up to about one week). This is not a full assessment of the company, and other market participants may reach different conclusions or use different time horizons.
Risk warning: All investments carry risk of loss. Past performance does not guarantee future results
Professional advice: You should consult qualified financial advisors before making investment decisions

Accuracy metric: Our 99% metric precision is based on historical evaluation in our internal testing against other validated sources and does not guarantee future results, market developments or forecasts.
Informational only: All information is provided for educational and informational purposes and should not be considered personalized financial advice
General nature: Any analyses, signals, sentiment labels or market insights are general in nature and do not take into account your personal financial situation, objectives or risk profile
Licensing: Quanor AB is not a licensed investment firm and is not subject to the Swedish Financial Supervisory Authority’s (Finansinspektionen) authorization requirement for advisory services
Interpretation: If any content could be interpreted as an investment recommendation, it shall be deemed general and non-personalized and is subject to this disclaimer
AI limitations: AI-generated analyses may contain errors, bias or be incomplete and should not be the sole basis for investment decisions without additional professional advice

Availability and outages: The service is provided without a guarantee of uninterrupted availability. Disruptions, maintenance, third-party failures or other technical issues may cause interruptions, delays or data errors. To the extent permitted by applicable law, Quanor AB is not liable for damages or losses arising from such outages.

Coverage: Quanor AB does not guarantee PR, report or pre-report analysis for every company a user follows. This is an ambition and may be affected by, among other things, data availability, issuer communications, market conditions, technical constraints and internal priorities.
Responsible analyst: Unless otherwise stated in connection with a publication, the responsible analyst for published material is Vilhelm Niklasson, Chief Operating Officer (COO) at Quanor AB.

Conflicts of interest: Quanor AB always discloses relevant conflicts of interest before or in direct connection with publication. Currently, Edvin Malmgård, Chief Commercial Officer (CCO) at Quanor AB, is Head of IR at Raketech and a board member of Adverty. He holds less than 1% of the shares in both companies. This does not affect Quanor’s analysis but is disclosed in accordance with good market practice.

MAR/EU compliance: If any content falls under Article 20 of MAR or Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2016/958, Quanor AB will, at publication, state the publishing entity, responsible analyst, date/time, instruments/issuers concerned, applied methodology, sources, assumptions and relevant conflicts of interest, and will maintain an update and withdrawal policy.
MiFID II: All Quanor AB content is general market information and should not be interpreted as a personal recommendation under MiFID II.
Updates and validity: Quanor updates or withdraws analyses when material new information arises. The timestamp indicates when the analysis was last updated.
Jurisdictions: This material is not directed at jurisdictions where distribution or use would be contrary to local law.

billing.title: Billing
billing.description: Subscription fees are billed in Swedish kronor (SEK). The Essential plan is 99 kr/month, billed monthly in advance.

cancellation.title: Cancellation
cancellation.description: You may cancel your subscription at any time. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.description: Refunds are provided at our discretion and typically only for technical issues that prevent service use.

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.description: All content, algorithms, AI models, data, insights and intellectual property associated with Quanor's services remain our exclusive property. You receive a limited, non-exclusive license to use our services during your subscription period.

prohibited.title: Prohibited data usage
prohibited.warning: STRICTLY PROHIBITED: Data scraping, mining, extraction or automated collection of content from our platform is forbidden.
items: No data scraping, crawling or automated extraction is permitted
Redistribution, republication or resale of our data is prohibited
No third party may present, display or use our data without written consent
Reverse engineering of our algorithms or AI models is strictly forbidden
Systematic downloading or bulk extraction will result in immediate termination

consent.title: Written consent required
consent.description: Any use of Quanor's data, insights or content outside our platform requires explicit written consent from Quanor. Unauthorized use may result in legal action and damages.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of liability
liability.description: Quanor’s liability is limited to the amount paid for services in the 12 months preceding any claim. We are not liable for investment losses, market volatility or decisions made based on our AI insights. Our services are provided "as is" without warranties.

governing.title: 8. Governing law
governing.description: These terms are governed by Swedish law. Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of Stockholm, Sweden.

contact.title: 9. Contact information
contact.description: For questions about these terms of service, contact us at:

what.title: What are cookies?
what.description: Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit our website. We only use essential cookies for the site to function, such as security, login and basic operations. Our services are informational only and do not provide investment advice.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.description: These cookies are required for our website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, session management, login and accessibility.

performance.title: Performance cookies
performance.description: We do not use performance cookies.

functional.title: Functional cookies
functional.description: We do not use functional cookies beyond those strictly necessary for the service to work.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: We do not use analytics cookies.

session.title: Session cookies
session.description: Temporary cookies that expire when you close your browser. Used to maintain your session and ensure core functions.

persistent.title: Persistent cookies
persistent.description: Remain on your device for a limited period or until you delete them. Used only if necessary, e.g. to remember a secure login.

firstParty.title: First-party cookies
firstParty.description: Set directly by Quanor for essential purposes only. We do not use analytic or performance cookies.

thirdParty.title: Third-party cookies
thirdParty.description: We do not use third-party cookies or third-party tracking via cookies.

choices.title: Your choices
choices.description: Since we only use essential cookies, we do not display a consent banner. You can manage and delete cookies at any time through your browser.

browser.title: Browser controls
browser.description: Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can usually:
items: View cookies stored on your device
Block all or specific cookies
Delete existing cookies
Set preferences for future cookies

impact.title: Impact of disabling cookies
impact.description: If you block essential cookies, parts of our website may stop working, such as login and secure sessions.

thirdParty.title: Third-party services
thirdParty.description: We do not use third-party cookies or tracking via cookies.

necessaryList.title: Which essential cookies we use
necessaryList.description: Below are examples of essential cookies that may be set by our website:

updates.title: Updates to this policy
updates.description: We may update this cookie policy when our technical solutions change or for legal reasons. The "Last updated" date will be revised with each significant change.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: If you have questions about our use of cookies, contact us at:
